card.title: Movement 6
card.description: This card can be played to move forward 6 spaces OR used as a Dodge card (Removes Debris and Ram). To play as Movement provide the value of 0, to play as a Dodge provide 1

card.title: Debris
card.description: The five racers at the front cannot play Movement cards

card.title: Ram
card.description: Move forward 3 spaces, the racers in front of you by 1 space after the move cannot play Movement cards

card.title: Flailing Flippers
card.description: Played on self, move forward 1 space. Anyone in your space at the start of your next turn are thrown off.

card.title: Frustration
card.description: Target another user, target is prevented from playing Movement cards

card.title: Distraction
card.description: Target another user, target is thrown off if they end a turn with Distraction AND another hazard applied

card.title: Motivation Loss
card.description: Target another user, thrown off in three turns if not removed

card.title: High Turbulence
card.description: Target another user, they can't play a Movement card higher than move 2.

card.title: Cyber Healthcare
card.description: Removes Motivation Loss and High Turbulence

card.title: Snack Break
card.description: Remove 2 Hazards and move back 2 spaces. Please provide the two numbers of the hazards you would like to remove. This card can be used to remove only 1 hazard, provide a 0 as the second input.

card.title: Dazzle
card.description: Affects 3 players behind you. They cannot move for 1 turn. Does not require a Remedy card to clear. You move forward one space after dazzling!

card.title: Tickle Laser
card.description: Target another racer, if Tickle Laser is applied for 2 full turns, they will be thrown off.
